    • Method Detail

      • instantiateBodyPart

        public void instantiateBodyPart​(int bias,
                                int randomness)
        Description copied from class: BodyPart
        This is used to instantiate the bodyPart. It takes on the typical values of the bodyPart. These values are manipulated by the bias and a randomness.
        Specified by:
        instantiateBodyPart in class BodyPart
        Parameters:
        bias - improves (if bias is positive) or worsens (if bias is negative) the stats and attribute of the body part. The bias is expressed as a present. So a bias of '10' would increase the bodyParts stats by 10%.
        randomness - changes the stats of the bodyPart by a random amount (both positive and negative). The greater the value, the stronger the random drift.

      • doDamage

        public void doDamage​(int damage)
        Description copied from class: BodyPart
        This function will deal a certain amount of damage to a bodyPart.
        Specified by:
        doDamage in class BodyPart
        Parameters:
        damage - the amount of damage to be dealt to the bodyPart

      • updatePersonWhenAttached

        public void updatePersonWhenAttached()
        Description copied from class: BodyPart
        This function makes sure all the stats and attributes of the person this bodyPart is attached to, are updated according to the bodyParts own stats.
        Specified by:
        updatePersonWhenAttached in class BodyPart
